revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:

|brand = Arris |model = MG2402G |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = /CT |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UID2402GCT |icid = 6670A-2402GCT |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = ARCT03131 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;DHCE2652; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Ralink;; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = <!-- CPU2 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 16 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = 4 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 128 |ram2chip = SK hynix;; |ram2_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |cm_down_c = 24 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, eSATA, SD Card slot, Cable Card, |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0, MoCA 2.0, DECT, ZigBee, battery backup, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/19/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 295 mm x 10 mm x 100 mm |weight = 5.1 lbs
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Celeno;CLR260; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Celeno;CLR260; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[https://www.arris.com/globalassets/resources/data-sheets/mg2402_ts_05jun13.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://www.ncube.com/product_catalog/_docs/_specsheet/MG2402_TS_05JUN13.pdf Datasheet on '''ncube.com''']
"PCB MADE IN CHINA", "ARRIS", "© 2013", and "ARRIS Group, Inc." :is silkscreened on the top of the board in the FCC photos. "ARCT03131" and "REV E" is on the bottom of the board :in the PCMCIA / Cable Card slot region.
*DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 channels
External photos show an ''[[Xfinity]]'' branded device, :indicating probable use with ''{{Used by service|Comcast}}'''s service.
[http://www.celeno.com/products/clr260.html '''Celeno-Ralink''' CLR260 Product page] :Both of the CL260s are using ''SiGe'' ([[Skyworks]]) PAM/FEMs :*The 2.4GHz radio ''appears'' to be using [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=1505 SE2620T] :*The 5GHz radio ''appears'' to be using [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=973 SE5012T]
===Specifications=== Additional chips used / more detailed P/Ns, per the FCC photos, follow... *[[ZigBee]]: [http://www.greenpeak.com/company/PressReleases/PR-GP710.html ''GreenPeak'' GP710] (GP710C4DGP?), [http://www.greenpeak.com/Press/PressKit/GP710ProductBrochure.pdf PBrief] *DECT: [http://www.dspg.com/english/Product.aspx?CatalogId=4&CategoryID=13&SubCategoryID=24&ProductId=98 ''DSP Group'' DCX81] *MoCA: some ''Entropic Communications'' chip
Additional specifications, per the datasheet linked to above, follows... *Battery backup **8-hour targeted run time **2lbs (0.91kg) Li-ion battery w/ 4.4AH capacity **Storage temperature: -4°F to 140°F (-20°C to 60°C) **''Storage above 77°F (25°C) will significantly ::reduce the life of the battery!'' *Dimensions: 295 mm x 10 mm x 100 mm *Weight: 3.1lbs w/ no battery, ~ 5.1 lbs w/ battery *Operating temperature: 41°F to 104°F (5°C to 40°C)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
